original_text: If Onesimus has done anything wrong to you, I will make it right again. If he took money from you, I will pay it back.
korean_text: 그가 만일 네게 불의를 하였거나 네게 빚진 것이 있으면 그것을 내 앞으로 계산하라

sentences.original_text: If Onesimus has done anything wrong to you,
I will make it right again.
If he took money from you,
